title: Yi Jou (Ruby) Liao
text:
Hi friends!
I’m currently a Master of Science student in the Genome Science and Technology (GSAT) program at University of British Columbia (UBC) in Vancouver.
Previously, I graduated from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) in 2022 with a BS in Computational & Systems Biology with a Concentration in Data Science. I was a Research Assistant at the Graeber Lab, where I contributed to a project characterizing recurrent ovarian cancers and assisted with the UCLA Metabolomics Center.
Check out my CV or LinkedIn for more of my background.
In my free time, I enjoy listening to music (pop/k-pop/indie/electronic) and playing video games (simulation/sandbox/story-driven).

title: Workflow setup
text:
Zotero 6 (stable)
Zotero 7 (beta)

Using beta version so I can use most recent versions of Better Notes for Zotero
Possible to have both installed on same device accessing same files, but I ran into issues with conflicting extensions so I generally only use Zotero 7




Zotero Connector Chrome extension: auto pull paper metadata and PDF from webpage
Using Zotero with Google Docs
Zotero Word Plugin

Tutorial: The Best Reference Manager Setup (Zotero + ZotFile + Cloud Storage)

Zotero only has 300 MB cloud storage at free tier! highly recommend to set up cloud storage for references from the start
Slightly outdated tutorial, should work okay for Zotero 6





Better BibTeX for Zotero: bibliographic data management utilities, especially useful for citekey formulas

Current citekey formula: auth.lower + '_' + shorttitle(1,1).lower + '_' + year

ZotFile (Zotero 6 only): auto move and rename file, send / retrieve PDF from tablet (a bit finnicky), not maintained anymore
Zotero Attanger (Zotero 7): basically the auto move and rename file function from ZotFile, very new / unstable (?)

Still using Zotero File but this repo is archived now…
Current file renaming rule: {%a_}{%y_}{%t}

Better Notes for Zotero: improved notetaking within Zotero
Night for Zotero 6: dark mode toggle

Night for Zotero 7
